SELECT SUM (num) AS num, areaSeq, areaName,COUNT(areaSeq) AS goodsCount FROM ( SELECT isnull(A.TotalSelectNum,0) AS num, C.Seq AS areaSeq, C.AreaName AS areaName FROM YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingShoppingCart] A LEFT JOIN YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetintUserArea] B ON A.User_Seq = B.User_Seq LEFT JOIN YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingArea] C ON B.MeetingArea_Seq = C.Seq WHERE A.Del = 0 AND B.Del = 0 AND C.Del = 0 AND A.MeetingGoods_Seq IN (${meetingGoodsSeqs}) UNION ALL
SELECT B.Num AS num, D.Seq AS areaSeq, D.AreaName AS areaName FROM YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingOrder] A LEFT JOIN (SELECT MeetingOrder_Seq,MeetingGoods_Seq,SUM(BuyCount) as Num FROM YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingOrderProduct] WHERE Del = 0 AND Cancel = 0 GROUP BY MeetingOrder_Seq,MeetingGoods_Seq,InputTime) B ON A.Seq = B.MeetingOrder_Seq LEFT JOIN YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetintUserArea] C ON A.User_Seq = C.User_Seq LEFT JOIN YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingArea] D ON C.MeetingArea_Seq = D.Seq
WHERE A.Del = 0 AND C.Del = 0 AND B.MeetingGoods_Seq IN (${meetingGoodsSeqs}) ) t GROUP BY areaSeq, areaName ORDER BY num DESC

SELECT meetingGoodsSeq, SUM (num) AS num ,count(meetingGoodsSeq) AS goodsCount FROM ( SELECT MeetingGoods_Seq AS meetingGoodsSeq,isnull(TotalSelectNum,0) AS num FROM YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingShoppingCart] WHERE Meeting_Seq = #{meetingSeq} AND Del = 0 UNION ALL
SELECT B.MeetingGoods_Seq AS meetingGoodsSeq, B.Num AS num FROM YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingOrder] A LEFT JOIN(SELECT MeetingOrder_Seq,MeetingGoods_Seq,SUM(BuyCount) as Num,Cancel FROM YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingOrderProduct] WHERE Del = 0 GROUP BY MeetingOrder_Seq,MeetingGoods_Seq,InputTime,Cancel) B ON A.Seq = B.MeetingOrder_Seq WHERE A.Del = 0 AND A.Meeting_Seq = #{meetingSeq} AND B.Cancel = 0 ) t GROUP BY meetingGoodsSeq ORDER BY SUM(num) DESC

SELECT meetingGoodsSeq, SUM (num) AS num FROM ( SELECT A.MeetingGoods_Seq AS meetingGoodsSeq,isnull(A.TotalSelectNum,0) AS num FROM YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingShoppingCart] A LEFT JOIN YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetintUserArea] B ON A.User_Seq = B.User_Seq LEFT JOIN YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingArea] C ON B.MeetingArea_Seq = C.Seq
WHERE A.Del = 0 AND A.Meeting_Seq = #{meetingSeq} AND B.Del = 0 AND C.Seq = #{areaSeq} UNION ALL
SELECT B.MeetingGoods_Seq AS meetingGoodsSeq, B.BuyCount AS num FROM YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingOrder] A LEFT JOIN YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingOrderProduct] B ON A.Seq = B.MeetingOrder_Seq LEFT JOIN YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetintUserArea] C ON A.User_Seq = C.User_Seq LEFT JOIN YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingArea] D ON C.MeetingArea_Seq = D.Seq
WHERE A.Del = 0 AND A.Meeting_Seq = #{meetingSeq} AND B.Del = 0 AND B.Cancel = 0 AND C.Del = 0 AND D.Seq = #{areaSeq} ) t GROUP BY meetingGoodsSeq ORDER BY SUM(num) DESC

SELECT meetingGoodsSeq,count(meetingGoodsSeq) AS goodsCount FROM (SELECT MeetingGoods_Seq AS meetingGoodsSeq FROM YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingShoppingCart] WHERE Meeting_Seq = #{meetingSeq} AND Del = 0
UNION ALL
SELECT B.MeetingGoods_Seq AS meetingGoodsSeq FROM YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingOrder] A LEFT JOIN(SELECT MeetingOrder_Seq,MeetingGoods_Seq,Cancel FROM YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingOrderProduct] WHERE Del = 0 GROUP BY MeetingOrder_Seq,MeetingGoods_Seq,InputTime,Cancel) B ON A.Seq = B.MeetingOrder_Seq WHERE A.Del = 0 AND A.Meeting_Seq = #{meetingSeq} AND Cancel = 0) t GROUP BY meetingGoodsSeq ORDER BY count(meetingGoodsSeq) DESC

SELECT A.* FROM [YHSROrderPlatform].[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingGoods] A WHERE A.Del = 0 AND A.Meeting_Seq IN (${meetingSeqs})
AND A.GoodID LIKE '%'+ #{meetingGoodsId}+'%'
order by A.Seq

SELECT TOP ${totalNum} meetingGoodsSeq, SUM (num) AS sum ,count(meetingGoodsSeq) AS count FROM (
SELECT B.MeetingGoods_Seq AS meetingGoodsSeq, B.Num AS num FROM YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingOrder] A LEFT JOIN(SELECT MeetingOrderSeq,MeetingGoods_Seq,TotalSelectNum as Num FROM YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingOrderCart] WHERE Del = 0 ) B ON A.Seq = B.MeetingOrderSeq
WHERE A.Del = 0 AND A.Meeting_Seq = #{meetingSeq} ) t GROUP BY meetingGoodsSeq ORDER BY SUM(num) DESC

SELECT TOP ${totalNum} SUM (num) AS sum, areaSeq, areaName,sum(count) AS count FROM ( SELECT B.Num AS num, D.Seq AS areaSeq, D.AreaName AS areaName,1 AS count FROM YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingOrder] A LEFT JOIN (SELECT MeetingOrderSeq,MeetingGoods_Seq,TotalSelectNum as Num FROM YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingOrderCart] WHERE Del = 0 ) B ON A.Seq = B.MeetingOrderSeq LEFT JOIN YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetintUserArea] C ON A.User_Seq = C.User_Seq LEFT JOIN YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingArea] D ON C.MeetingArea_Seq = D.Seq WHERE A.Del = 0 AND C.Del = 0 AND B.MeetingGoods_Seq IN (${meetingGoodsSeqs}) ) t GROUP BY areaSeq, areaName ORDER BY sum DESC

SELECT TOP ${totalNum} SUM (num) AS sum,userSeq,sum(count) AS count FROM ( SELECT A.User_Seq AS userSeq, B.Num AS num,1 AS count FROM YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingOrder] A LEFT JOIN(SELECT MeetingOrderSeq,sum(TotalSelectNum) as Num FROM YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingOrderCart] WHERE Del = 0 group by MeetingOrderSeq ) B ON A.Seq = B.MeetingOrderSeq WHERE A.Del = 0 AND A.Meeting_Seq = #{meetingSeq} ) t GROUP BY userSeq ORDER BY SUM(num) DESC

SELECT F.Seq AS categorySeq, SUM ( E.count ) AS count, SUM ( E.num ) AS num FROM [YHSmartRetail].[dbo].[YHSR_Goods_Category] F LEFT JOIN [YHSmartRetail].[dbo].[YHSR_Goods_Category] G ON G.parentSeq= F.Seq LEFT JOIN [YHSmartRetail].[dbo].[YHSR_Goods_Category] H ON H.parentSeq= G.Seq LEFT JOIN [YHSROrderPlatform].[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingGoods] A ON ( F.Seq= A.Category_Seq OR G.Seq = A.Category_Seq OR H.Seq= A.Category_Seq ) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT C.MeetingGoods_Seq AS shoesSeq, 1 AS count, C.TotalSelectNum AS num FROM [YHSROrderPlatform].[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingShoppingCart] C WHERE C.Del=0 UNION ALL SELECT D.MeetingGoods_Seq AS shoesSeq, 1 AS count,
sum(D.TotalSelectNum) AS num FROM [YHSROrderPlatform].[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingOrderCart] D GROUP BY D.MeetingOrderSeq,D.MeetingGoods_Seq ) E ON E.shoesSeq= A.Seq WHERE A.Meeting_Seq=#{meetingSeq} AND A.Del = 0 AND F.ParentSeq=#{categorySeq} AND F.Company_Seq=#{companySeq} GROUP BY F.Seq HAVING SUM ( E.count ) > 0 ORDER BY
SUM ( E.count )
SUM ( E.num ) DESC

SELECT t.seq, COUNT ( t.seq ) as count FROM ( SELECT A.Seq AS seq FROM YHSmartRetail.dbo.YHSR_Goods_Category A LEFT JOIN YHSmartRetail.dbo.YHSR_Goods_Category B ON A.Seq= B.ParentSeq AND B.Del=0 LEFT JOIN YHSmartRetail.dbo.YHSR_Goods_Category C ON B.Seq= C.ParentSeq AND C.Del=0 LEFT JOIN YHSROrderPlatform.dbo.YHSR_OP_MeetingGoods D ON ( D.Category_Seq= A.Seq OR D.Category_Seq= B.Seq OR D.Category_Seq= C.Seq ) WHERE A.ParentSeq= #{categorySeq} AND A.Del=0 AND D.Del=0 AND A.Company_Seq= #{companySeq} AND D.Meeting_Seq= #{meetingSeq} ) t GROUP BY t.seq

SELECT meetingGoodsSeq, SUM ( num ) AS num, COUNT ( meetingGoodsSeq ) AS goodsCount FROM ( SELECT A.MeetingGoods_Seq AS meetingGoodsSeq, isnull( A.TotalSelectNum, 0 ) AS num FROM YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingShoppingCart] A LEFT JOIN YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingGoods] B ON A.MeetingGoods_Seq=B.Seq WHERE A.Meeting_Seq = #{meetingSeq} AND A.Del = 0 AND B.Del=0 AND B.Category_Seq in (SELECT C.seq FROM YHSmartRetail.[dbo].[YHSR_Goods_Category] C WHERE C.seq=#{categorySeq} or C.ParentSeq=#{categorySeq}) UNION ALL SELECT B.MeetingGoods_Seq AS meetingGoodsSeq, B.Num AS num FROM YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingOrder] A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.MeetingOrder_Seq, A.MeetingGoods_Seq, A.Cancel, SUM ( A.BuyCount ) AS Num FROM YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingOrderProduct] A LEFT JOIN YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingGoods] B ON A.MeetingGoods_Seq=B.Seq WHERE A.Del = 0 AND B.Del=0 AND B.Category_Seq in(SELECT seq FROM YHSmartRetail.[dbo].[YHSR_Goods_Category] C WHERE C.seq=#{categorySeq} or ParentSeq=#{categorySeq}) GROUP BY A.MeetingOrder_Seq, A.MeetingGoods_Seq, A.InputTime, A.Cancel ) B ON A.Seq = B.MeetingOrder_Seq WHERE A.Del = 0 AND A.Meeting_Seq =#{meetingSeq} AND B.Cancel = 0 ) t GROUP BY meetingGoodsSeq ORDER BY SUM ( num ) DESC

SELECT meetingGoodsSeq, isnull(COUNT ( meetingGoodsSeq ),0) AS goodsCount FROM ( SELECT MeetingGoods_Seq AS meetingGoodsSeq FROM YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingShoppingCart] A LEFT JOIN YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingGoods] B ON A.MeetingGoods_Seq= B.Seq WHERE A.Meeting_Seq = #{ meetingSeq } AND A.Del = 0 AND B.Del= 0 AND B.Category_Seq IN ( SELECT seq FROM YHSmartRetail.[dbo].[YHSR_Goods_Category] C WHERE C.seq=#{ categorySeq } OR ParentSeq =#{ categorySeq } ) UNION ALL SELECT B.MeetingGoods_Seq AS meetingGoodsSeq FROM YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingOrder] A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MeetingOrder_Seq, MeetingGoods_Seq FROM YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingOrderProduct] WHERE Del = 0 AND Cancel = 0 GROUP BY MeetingOrder_Seq, MeetingGoods_Seq, InputTime ) B ON A.Seq = B.MeetingOrder_Seq LEFT JOIN YHSROrderPlatform.[dbo].[YHSR_OP_MeetingGoods] C ON B.MeetingGoods_Seq= C.Seq WHERE A.Del = 0 AND A.Meeting_Seq = #{ meetingSeq } AND C.Del= 0 AND C.Category_Seq IN ( SELECT seq FROM YHSmartRetail.[dbo].[YHSR_Goods_Category] D WHERE D.seq=#{ categorySeq } OR D.ParentSeq=#{ categorySeq } ) ) t GROUP BY meetingGoodsSeq ORDER BY COUNT ( meetingGoodsSeq ) DESC
